Lab assignments

Every other Thursday we will make use of the second half of the class time to work on a lab. You will be randomly assigned two or three lab partners. Labs are meant to be finished in class, but final versions are due by 10 pm the following Monday.

Lab Date
Lab #1 Feb 3, due Feb 7
Lab #2 Feb 17, due Feb 21
Lab #3 Mar 10, due Mar 21
Lab #4 Mar 31, due Apr 4
